tool_description: An API that provides you with Images of the popular Japanese Popstar Hatsune Miku.
name: MikuAPI
title: MikuAPI

api_list.name: getImage
getRandomImage
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mikuapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/image/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mikuapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: checkHash
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mikuapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/image/file/hash"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mikuapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
